actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: To amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to allow Members to require rollcall votes to strike specific line items contained in appropriation bills.

summary.text: Amends rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to allow a Member of the House to demand a roll call vote to strike any line item in any measure making or continuing appropriations if supported by 49 other Members. Makes it in order for that Member to make a point of order against further consideration of such measure by the House if the vote does not occur.

titles.title: To amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to allow Members to require rollcall votes to strike specific line items contained in appropriation bills.
